import Link from "next/link"; import { checkUser, currentUser, authInstance } from "../src/dbCon"; import Router from "next/router"; authInstance().onAuthStateChanged(user => { if (user) { document .querySelectorAll(".signed-out") .forEach(item => (item.style.display = "none")); document .querySelectorAll(".signed-in") .forEach(item => (item.style.display = "block")); } else { document .querySelectorAll(".signed-out") .forEach(item => (item.style.display = "block")); document .querySelectorAll(".signed-in") .forEach(item => (item.style.display = "none")); } }); const blogNavbar = () => (

  • { authInstance() .signOut() .then(() => Router.push("/")) .catch(() => console.log("Sign-out problem.")); }} > Log-Out
); export default blogNavbar;
